title: About me
description: Experience developing applications in various programming languages, database administration using Microsoft SQL Server and MySQL, and knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Currently, I have over one year of experience in creating solutions and managing the development process of an ERP system.
description2: I enjoy developing solutions that help automate processes and support the personal growth of individuals, as well as systems that improve daily operations.
hobbiesDescription: I enjoy creating in various areas, both in my professional work and in my personal hobbies, such as drawing using traditional and digital techniques. I also enjoy developing and modifying interactive 3D characters in Unity and exploring new tools and programming languages.
